dialogues.text: I'm full of surprises. (beat) Seems we’re in a massive industrial park. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 56 76 77 78

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: There’s an underground parking garage that runs for a mile under the entire complex. We need to get down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mei Zhao, on a stretcher, is wheeled toward a waiting helicopter, but Lillian’s chopper is circling above.

dialogues.speaker: CHOPPER LOUDSPEAKER
dialogues.text: Stand down and drop your weapons! Cong looks over the side of the building at the twenty vehicles and their lights surrounding them. Amos appears the roof door, his face bloody.

dialogues.speaker: AMOS
dialogues.text: Cong! Cong turns. Amos waves him back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gabriel, Riley and Crispin enter the sprawling parking garage. They stay low as they move alongside cars, trying doors that won’t open. Riley points to the ONSTAR STICKER the window of a VOLVO.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: Can you do something with that?

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: (smiles) I believe I can. He closes his eyes and a moment later, the door locks pop the engine starts.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: Show off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Volvo peels through the parking garage. They seem to home free, until... About a hundred yards ahead, Jin Cong steps out in front them, pointing his gun directly at them.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 57 Then Jin Cong motions to someone we can’t see. It’s Amos TWO of his MEN carrying the unconscious Mei Zhao, her bandaged head slumped forward.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: Don’t stop! He has a gun!

dialogues.speaker: CRISPIN
dialogues.text: But, she doesn’t! You’1l kill her! Stop the car! Gabriel SLAMS ON THE BRAKES, barely stopping before them.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: I said don’t stop! She jumps out of the car, gun drawn. Gabriel is already o his GUN drawn. It’s a standoff with Cong and his men.

dialogues.speaker: AMOS
dialogues.text: You'll notice they’re only pointing their guns at Gabriel. Let’s trade. We take the car, Gabriel lives.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: How about I shoot you instead and whatever happens, happens?

dialogues.speaker: AMOS
dialogues.text: You’re not authorized to make that decision and you know it.

dialogues.speaker: CONG
dialogues.text: You are not a man, anymore, Mr. Black. You are a piece of very expensive military hardware.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: Dr. Crispin. Get out of the car slowly.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: What do you think you’re doing?

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: (to Cong) Take the car. Nobody shoots.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: Not a chance.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: Gabriel.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 58 He looks at her. He knows she’s right. There’s no choice here. He relents, but doesn’t drop his weapon. Cong’s men load Mei Zhao into the Volvo, as Amos gets beh the wheel. Cong slowly backs into the passenger seat. Gab just can’t let it happen and HE SHOOTS CONG IN THE LEG. Cong falls to the ground. Gabriel and Riley shoot, killin one of Cong’s men. Amos guns the engine and takes off, as Gabriel and Riley pepper the back of the car with bullets but it speeds off into the darkness of the parking struct Gabriel holds his gun on Cong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chinese thugs sit on the pavement, their hands cuffed beh their backs. Both Crispin and Riley are being attended to the ambulance as Lillian and Gabriel approach.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: Any sign of Amos?

dialogues.speaker: LILLIAN
dialogues.text: No. The garage has twenty-seven exits. They must have slipped out.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: We let the chip go.

dialogues.speaker: CRISPIN
dialogues.text: I’m the one who built it. I’m sorry, Lillian. It was a mistake.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: If anyone is to be blamed, it’s me. I let Amos get away.

dialogues.speaker: CRISPIN
dialogues.text: You made a choice. I thought it was the prudent one. You’re his protector? Is that how this works?

dialogues.speaker: LILLIAN
dialogues.text: He’s not very good at following orders.

dialogues.speaker: CRISPIN
dialogues.text: If we wanted a robot, we would have built one. We wanted a human. And we got one. That affects all of them - Lillian most of all.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 59

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A single lane bridge in the middle of dense forest. TWO P of headlights emerge from the thick darkness. The TWO SUV wind their way to the edge of the bridge and stop. At tha moment, a pair of HEADLIGHTS IGNITES on the other side of bridge, from a CAR already waiting. The SUV doors open and the passengers climb out. Lillian, Gabriel, and Riley from one SUV. From the other, Gonzo an Jameson and a HANDCUFFED prisoner, Jin Cong. On the other side of the bridge, Sheng-Li Wang steps out the car, with two CHINESE AGENTS and begins to walk to th center of the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: Are you going to explain why we're handing Jin Cong back to the MSS?

dialogues.speaker: LILLIAN
dialogues.text: We're making a trade. Gabriel and Riley trade perplexed looks as they follow Lillian out to the center of the bridge, where Gonzo and Jameson hand Cong over to Wang’s men. Wang remains.

dialogues.speaker: LILLIAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You said you had information. About Amelia Hayes. Gabriel looks up. Riley, too. They’re shocked.

dialogues.speaker: SHENG-LI WANG
dialogues.text: The Pakistanis claim she is alive.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: Where is she?

dialogues.speaker: SHENG-LI WANG
dialogues.text: They had her under surveillance as recently as three months ago.

dialogues.speaker: LILLIAN
dialogues.text: I need proof, Wang.

dialogues.speaker: SHENG-LI WANG
dialogues.text: She boarded a flight from Punjab to Zurich on June 12. I’m sure you can find the video yourself. (shakes Lillian’s hand) It’s much better when we’re friends, yes?  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 60. Lillian smiles and turns and they all walk back.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: I need to go to Zurich.

dialogues.speaker: LILLIAN
dialogues.text: No, you need to go to Nevada.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: Nevada?

dialogues.speaker: LILLIAN
dialogues.text: The CIA Drone Command Center is there. They lost one over Afghanistan. They think it was hacked.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: Lillian...

dialogues.speaker: LILLIAN
dialogues.text: Nevada, Gabriel. After that, it’s better for both of us if you don’t tell me your travel plans.

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: I was just going to say thank you.

dialogues.speaker: LILLIAN
dialogues.text: For what? This never happened. She smiles and keeps walking. Gabriel looks at Riley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Riley and Gabriel sit on a plane high over the U.S.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: Yeah. He reclines his seat and closes his eyes. Without looking over, he hands her A $20 bill.

dialogues.speaker: RILEY
dialogues.text: What's this for?

dialogues.speaker: GABRIEL
dialogues.text: The next time. She smiles and takes it. They sit quietly for a moment.  INTELLIGENCE_Seitzman_Network Draft 4_012813 61 82

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We GLIDE slowly across the ramshackle apartment past two CHINESE MEN playing cards, past the sofa where we find Am sleeping and we continue over to the single bed against t peeling wall where Mei Zhao lies, comatose. MOVE IN on Mei Zhao... closer, closer... until HER EYES O
